key_title: Key to the species of Rorippa

Key to the families of Dicotyledons
Key to the genera of Brassicaceae

source.author: Entwisle, T.J.
source.title: Brassicaceae
source.in_title: Flora of Victoria. Vol. 3. Dicotyledons Winteraceae to Myrtaceae
source.citation: Modified from: Entwisle, T.J. (1996). Brassicaceae. In: Walsh, N.G.; Entwisle, T.J. (eds), Flora of Victoria. Vol. 3. Dicotyledons Winteraceae to Myrtaceae. Inkata Press, Melbourne.

leads.lead_text: Petals white; seeds reticulate or ± smooth, often mucilaginous when wet
Petals yellow; seeds covered with small bumps, not mucilaginous
Stamens 4; seed coat spongy, not reticulate
Leaves petiolate; pedicels usually more than 8 mm long; seeds not mucilaginous when wet
Leaves sessile (stem leaves sagittate); pedicels 3–8 mm long; seeds mucilaginous when wet
Seeds in 2 rows, not winged, up to 0.8 mm long; petals shorter than sepals
Seeds in 1 row, slightly winged, more than 0.7 mm long; petals longer than sepals
Fruit somewhat inflated, up to 10 mm long and 3 mm wide; petals 1–2 mm long
Fruit linear, slender, usually > 10 mm long, c. 1 mm wide; petals 2–6 mm long
